metadata.title: CVE-2022-34038 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Etcd v3.5.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice via function PageWriter.write in pagewriter.go. NOTE: the vendor'sposition is that this is not a vulnerability.

criterions.comment: etcd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
